items.content_html: 🚀 A lightweight Angular framework built with plain JavaScript. It contains a core features such as Components, Routing, Data Binding, Pipes, HTTP, and Services. It's a perfect resource for learning how modern frameworks work under the hood.
items.title: Shaban-Eissa/Vanilla-Angular: 🚀 A lightweight Angular framework built with plain JavaScript. It contains a core features such as Components, Routing, Data Binding, Pipes, HTTP, and Services. It's a perfect resource for learning how modern frameworks work under the hood.
